country.turkey.metaDesc: Browse leading doctors in Turkey. Filter by clinic, department and city.
country.turkey.title: Turkey — Doctors Directory
country.turkey.subtitle: Information-only catalog. Acibadem, Liv, Memorial, Medicana, Medistate, Medipol, NP Brain, Anadolu, Dünyagöz — Istanbul, Ankara, Antalya, Kocaeli.

country.turkey.sort.name: Name
country.turkey.empty: No matches. Try changing filters or query.
country.turkey.emptyHint: Try another city, clinic or specialty.
country.turkey.usp.expertsDesc: We shortlist department heads and leaders of specialized units.
country.turkey.usp.safeDesc: Clear coordination, documents in your language, no marketing contracts.
country.turkey.usp.careDesc: Personal guidance from the first message to your return home.
country.turkey.pitch.title: Not sure which doctor is right for you?
country.turkey.pitch.subtitle: Tell me about the diagnosis and preferences. I’ll match you with the right department head, prepare the request, and help you get a quick reply from the clinic.

people.doctors.medipol-mega-transplant-s: Director, Center for Organ Transplantation — Medipol Mega University Hospital

people.doctors.medipol-mega-istanbul-car: Professor of Cardiology — Medipol Mega University Hospital
Interventional cardiologist focusing on coronary CT angiography, ischemic heart disease and preventive cardiology. Leads multidisciplinary heart care at Medipol Mega.
Cardiologist with interest in cardiovascular prevention and complex coronary disease; active in public education and clinical research.
people.doctors.medipol-mega-istanbul-cv-: Cardiac surgeon specializing in aortic and valve surgery, minimally invasive techniques and CABG in high-risk patients.

people.doctors.medipol-mega-istanbul-onc: Medical oncologist with broad expertise across solid tumors; uses modern chemo-, immuno- and targeted therapies; active in clinical research and education.
Treats common solid malignancies with evidence-based systemic therapies; published author and speaker on contemporary oncology.
people.doctors.medipol-mega-istanbul-rad: Radiation oncologist applying image-guided and stereotactic techniques (IGRT, SBRT) for breast and other solid tumors.

people.doctors.medipol-mega-istanbul-gas: Hepatology-focused gastroenterologist with international experience; manages liver disease, IBD and advanced endoscopy.
Cares for a wide range of GI disorders; promotes food safety and infection prevention; performs diagnostic and therapeutic endoscopy.
people.doctors.medipol-mega-istanbul-tra: Lead liver-transplant and HPB surgeon with international training; performs complex living-donor liver transplant and oncologic liver surgery.
Associate Professor of General Surgery & Transplantation
General surgeon with fellowship training in liver transplantation; part of the Medipol Mega Transplant Center team.
people.doctors.medipol-mega-istanbul-ort: Orthopedic surgeon managing trauma, arthroplasty and sports injuries; experienced in complex fracture and joint reconstruction.
people.doctors.medipol-mega-istanbul-neu: Senior neurosurgeon renowned for aneurysm/AVM microsurgery and skull-base techniques; former president of the Turkish Neurosurgical Society.
Leads complex brain tumor and epilepsy surgery programs, using intraoperative MRI and neuronavigation for maximal safe resection.

people.doctors.dunyagoz-etiler-pediatric: Focus on pediatric eye health, amblyopia and strabismus; 1,000+ strabismus surgeries; ESA and AAO member.
people.doctors.dunyagoz-ankara-tunus-cat: Cataract and intraocular lens surgery; >25,000 cases; experience includes training at Sinskey Ophthalmic Center / UCLA.
people.doctors.dunyagoz-ankara-tunus-ref: Performs LASIK/SMILE and cataract procedures; cornea and refractive specialist in Ankara Tunus.
people.doctors.dunyagoz-ankara-tunus-ocu: 25+ years of practice; works in oculoplastics, cornea and contact lens; active in Turkish Ophthalmology Society units.
people.doctors.dunyagoz-ankara-tunus-gla: Glaucoma and cataract specialist at Ankara Tunus; education includes fellowship period at Wills Eye Hospital; member of EGS and World Glaucoma Association.
people.doctors.dunyagoz-antalya-uveitis-: Senior ophthalmologist in Antalya; focuses on uveitis and glaucoma; 40+ years in practice with international publications.
people.doctors.dunyagoz-antalya-retina-e: Treats vitreoretinal disease, cataract and neuro-ophthalmic conditions; 50+ publications; practicing since 2004.
